column4: guys, i been doing some reading on 'vi' , it seems as an outdated wierd text editor, am i wrong ??
guys, i been doing some reading on 'vi' , it seems as an outdated wierd text editor, am i wrong ??
It's a editor which is usable without X and is installed in some form on nearly all linux distributions, and is very powerful if used correctly
Some like using it for everything, for others, it's only used when a person can't open a normal editor.
